title: Champion shards = New champs for lower cost?
body:
So i have every champion that has been released so far from means of many a years grinding away IP.
My idea is that since i own every champion, I can unlock new champion with champion shards right?

For example Camille is coming out and will be 7800 the first day of her release, if I buy 3 champion shards for 1700 each = 5100 re roll them for champion I can get her for 2700 IP less?

replies.body: Yeah ive got TEN 6300 champs left, if I use just champion shards to buy them I would spent only 51,000 IP instead of 63,000 IP saying 12,000 IP! Which is insane because on an average you earn 100 IP per game (definitly way less) but it would take 120 more games for me to earn that IP.

and this is why i dont buy skins, i keep pooling my shards and rerolling them or giving myself just enough blue dust to outright buy who i land on,  i havent bought a champ for full IP since march and that was when i as grinding my account back up pretty much and just getting 15-20champs i really like in general, now i just got mostly an aram pool of 55 champs im good with, wish i could give riot back 5 champs or so from rerolls... 

but yeah even skins, ive spent about $120 on rp this year, i have 5 legendaries, an ultimate, and just about a skin for every champ but a few, i wont take a skin just to get a skin, ill just reroll it, got my battlecast cho, dunkmaster darius, dj sona, omega squad teemo, zombie brand and a couple of legacy epics that way also... riot cut itself shrt a couple of hundred on my acc.
Yeap that's correct. It works with skins as well :D
so just reroll a bunch of champ shards when it comes out.
